Package controller

Class TimeTableMgr

java.lang.Object
controller.TimeTableMgr
public class TimeTableMgr
extends java.lang.Object
Class that manages the timetable of a student Checks the timing clashes between indexes

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    TimeTableMgr()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean checkClash​(java.util.ArrayList<Index> studentIndex, Index index)
    Checks if timings of the lessons of the existing indices in a timetable clash with the timings of the lessons of another index If the two lessons being compared are labs, then the function checks if the weeks for them are alternate ones.
    boolean checkClash​(java.util.ArrayList<Index> studentIndex, Index index, Index skipIndex)
    Checks if timings of the lessons of the existing indices in a timetable clash with the timings of the lessons of another index If the two lessons being compared are labs, then the function checks if the weeks for them are alternate ones.
    boolean checkExistingCourse​(java.util.ArrayList<Index> studentIndex, Index index)
    Checks if student has already enrolled in this course or the student has put it on waitList by checking if an index exists in a list of indexes
    boolean checkVacancy​(Index index)
    Checks if index has vacancies

  • Constructor Details

    • TimeTableMgr

      public TimeTableMgr()

  • Method Details

    • checkClash

      public boolean checkClash​(java.util.ArrayList<Index> studentIndex, Index index)
      Checks if timings of the lessons of the existing indices in a timetable clash with the timings of the lessons of another index If the two lessons being compared are labs, then the function checks if the weeks for them are alternate ones. No clash in this case
      Parameters:
      studentIndex - array of indices in the student's timetable
      index - additional index for which clash is being checked
      Returns:
      returns a boolean value that determines whether the timings clash or not

    • checkClash

      public boolean checkClash​(java.util.ArrayList<Index> studentIndex, Index index, Index skipIndex)
      Checks if timings of the lessons of the existing indices in a timetable clash with the timings of the lessons of another index If the two lessons being compared are labs, then the function checks if the weeks for them are alternate ones. No clash in this case This overloaded function is required while changing the index or swapping it with another student as the old index should not be considered while checking for clash
      Parameters:
      studentIndex - array of indices in the student's timetable
      index - additional index for which clash is being checked
      skipIndex - index present in the timetable that should be considered while checking for clash. It is the old index of the student in the event of changing or swapping
      Returns:
      returns a boolean value that determines whether the timings clash or not

    • checkExistingCourse

      public boolean checkExistingCourse​(java.util.ArrayList<Index> studentIndex, Index index)
      Checks if student has already enrolled in this course or the student has put it on waitList by checking if an index exists in a list of indexes
      Parameters:
      studentIndex - list of indices that the student has been registered for
      index - index that needs to be checked
      Returns:
      returns a boolean value that determines if an index is present in a list of indexes

    • checkVacancy

      public boolean checkVacancy​(Index index)
      Checks if index has vacancies
      Parameters:
      index - index object whose vacancies need to be known
      Returns:
      boolean value indicating if the index has vacancies or not
